response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000, making it a compelling opportunity for you. I trust this proposal aligns well with your financial considerations and enhances the value proposition for you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
